script:module:
'************************************* 'Add Row Functionality 'Q_IT_Payment_Credits 'Case : Self '************************************* Sub addRow_Q_IT_Payment_CreditsList() notCallListener = true Call InsertRowsAndFillFormulas("DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidAdvanceListS") 'Add All Remove Listeners call removeKRAListners(qPaymentRegNumAdv_Listener,qPaymentRegNumAdv) call removeKRAListners(qDateOfDepositAdv_Listener,qDateOfDepositAdv) 'Add All Add Listeners call addKRAListnersMultiCell("Q_IT_Payment_Credits","DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidAdvanceListS","A","qPaymentRegNumAdv_Listener_",qPaymentRegNumAdv_Listener,qPaymentRegNumAdv) call addKRAListnersMultiCell("Q_IT_Payment_Credits","DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidAdvanceListS","B","qDateOfDepositAdv_Listener_",qDateOfDepositAdv_Listener,qDateOfDepositAdv) notCallListener = false End Sub
'************************************* 'Check on Payment registration Number 'Q_IT_Payment_Credits 'Case : Self '************************************* Sub qPaymentRegNumAdv_Listener_modified(oEv) if (notCallListener) then exit Sub end if ' Added By KANDARP thisComponent.CurrentController.Frame.ContainerWindow.Enable= False call removeKRAListners(qPaymentRegNumAdv_Listener,qPaymentRegNumAdv)
'code
oSheet = ThisComponent.CurrentController.getActiveSheet() if oSheet.name = "Amendment" then call addKRAListnersMultiCell("Q_IT_Payment_Credits","DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidAdvanceListS","A","qPaymentRegNumAdv_Listener_",qPaymentRegNumAdv_Listener,qPaymentRegNumAdv) thisComponent.CurrentController.Frame.ContainerWindow.Enable= True Exit sub End If if(oSheet.name<>"A_Basic_Info") then
Dim startRowNum as Long , endRowNum as Long, startColumnNum as Long , endcolumnNum as Long Dim sheet as Object
sheet=ThisComponent.sheets.getByName("Q_IT_Payment_Credits") sheet.Unprotect(Pwd) Dim dateFlag as Boolean Dim msgStr As string
oRange = ThisComponent.NamedRanges.getByName("DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidAdvanceListS") startRowNum = oRange.getReferredCells().getRangeAddress().StartRow endRowNum = oRange.getReferredCells().getRangeAddress().EndRow oColRange = sheet.getCellrangeByName("A"&(startRowNum+1)&":A"&(endRowNum+1)) startRowNum = oColRange.getRangeAddress().StartRow endRowNum = oColRange.getRangeAddress().EndRow
unprotectsheet("Q_IT_Payment_Credits") Dim PRNNo As String Dim testPRNNo As String '*** currRange = ThisComponent.getCurrentSelection() If Not IsNull(oColRange.queryintersection(currRange.rangeaddress)) and (currRange.supportsService("com.sun.star.sheet.SheetCell")) then PRNNo= currRange.string currRange.string=Ucase(PRNNo) row= currRange.getCellAddress().Row if PRNNo<>"" then
for i=startRowNum to endRowNum
testPRNNo=sheet.getCellByPosition(0,i).string ' result = TestDate(dateVal) if row=i then 'Skip Else If testPRNNo<>"" then If UCase(testPRNNo) = Ucase(PRNNo) then MsgBox "You have already entered details of '" & Ucase(PRNNo) & "' in Row " & (i+1) currRange.string="" Exit for End If End If End If Next
'---Wife PRN number check--- oRange = ThisComponent.NamedRanges.getByName("DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidAdvanceListW") startRowNum = oRange.getReferredCells().getRangeAddress().StartRow endRowNum = oRange.getReferredCells().getRangeAddress().EndRow oColRange = sheet.getCellrangeByName("A"&(startRowNum+1)&":A"&(endRowNum+1)) startRowNum = oColRange.getRangeAddress().StartRow endRowNum = oColRange.getRangeAddress().EndRow
for i=startRowNum to endRowNum
testPRNNo=sheet.getCellByPosition(0,i).string ' result = TestDate(dateVal) if row=i then 'Skip Else If testPRNNo<>"" then If UCase(testPRNNo) = Ucase(PRNNo) then MsgBox "You have already entered details of '" & Ucase(PRNNo) & "' in Row " & (i+1) currRange.string="" Exit for End If End If End If Next '---Wife PRN number check---
'---Self Assess Self number check--- oRange = ThisComponent.NamedRanges.getByName("DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidSelfAssmntListS") startRowNum = oRange.getReferredCells().getRangeAddress().StartRow endRowNum = oRange.getReferredCells().getRangeAddress().EndRow oColRange = sheet.getCellrangeByName("A"&(startRowNum+1)&":A"&(endRowNum+1)) startRowNum = oColRange.getRangeAddress().StartRow endRowNum = oColRange.getRangeAddress().EndRow
for i=startRowNum to endRowNum
testPRNNo=sheet.getCellByPosition(0,i).string ' result = TestDate(dateVal) if row=i then 'Skip Else If testPRNNo<>"" then If UCase(testPRNNo) = Ucase(PRNNo) then MsgBox "You have already entered details of '" & Ucase(PRNNo) & "' in Row " & (i+1) currRange.string="" Exit for End If End If End If Next '---Self Assess Self number check---
'---Self Assess Wife number check--- oRange = ThisComponent.NamedRanges.getByName("DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidSelfAssmntListW") startRowNum = oRange.getReferredCells().getRangeAddress().StartRow endRowNum = oRange.getReferredCells().getRangeAddress().EndRow oColRange = sheet.getCellrangeByName("A"&(startRowNum+1)&":A"&(endRowNum+1)) startRowNum = oColRange.getRangeAddress().StartRow endRowNum = oColRange.getRangeAddress().EndRow
for i=startRowNum to endRowNum
testPRNNo=sheet.getCellByPosition(0,i).string ' result = TestDate(dateVal) if row=i then 'Skip Else If testPRNNo<>"" then If UCase(testPRNNo) = Ucase(PRNNo) then MsgBox "You have already entered details of '" & Ucase(PRNNo) & "' in Row " & (i+1) currRange.string="" Exit for End If End If End If Next '---Self Assess Wife number check---
End If End If protectsheet("Q_IT_Payment_Credits") end If
'code
call addKRAListnersMultiCell("Q_IT_Payment_Credits","DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidAdvanceListS","A","qPaymentRegNumAdv_Listener_",qPaymentRegNumAdv_Listener,qPaymentRegNumAdv) thisComponent.CurrentController.Frame.ContainerWindow.Enable= True end sub
'************************************* 'Check on Date Of Deposit 'Q_IT_Payment_Credits 'Case : Self '************************************* sub qDateOfDepositAdv_Listener_modified(oEv) if (notCallListener) then exit Sub end if ' Added By KANDARP thisComponent.CurrentController.Frame.ContainerWindow.Enable= False call removeKRAListners(qDateOfDepositAdv_Listener,qDateOfDepositAdv)
'code
oSheet = ThisComponent.CurrentController.getActiveSheet() '******************************* 'Code Added to restrict Listeners to be called while Amendment if oSheet.name = "Amendment" then call addKRAListnersMultiCell("Q_IT_Payment_Credits","DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidAdvanceListS","B","qDateOfDepositAdv_Listener_",qDateOfDepositAdv_Listener,qDateOfDepositAdv) thisComponent.CurrentController.Frame.ContainerWindow.Enable= True Exit sub End If '*******************************
if(oSheet.name<>"A_Basic_Info") then
Dim startRowNum as Long , endRowNum as Long, startColumnNum as Long , endcolumnNum as Long Dim sheet as Object
sheet=ThisComponent.sheets.getByName("Q_IT_Payment_Credits") sheet.Unprotect(Pwd) Dim dateFlag as Boolean Dim msgStr As string Dim startDate as String Dim endDate as String
oRange = ThisComponent.NamedRanges.getByName("DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidAdvanceListS") startRowNum = oRange.getReferredCells().getRangeAddress().StartRow endRowNum = oRange.getReferredCells().getRangeAddress().EndRow oColRange = sheet.getCellrangeByName("B"&(startRowNum+1)&":B"&(endRowNum+1)) unprotectsheet("A_Basic_Info") startDate = ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("A_Basic_Info").getCellrangeByName("RetInf.RetStartDate").string endDate = ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("A_Basic_Info").getCellrangeByName("RetInf.RetEndDate").string protectsheet("A_Basic_Info") unprotectsheet("Q_IT_Payment_Credits") Dim dateVal As String '*** currRange = ThisComponent.getCurrentSelection() If Not IsNull(oColRange.queryintersection(currRange.rangeaddress)) and (currRange.supportsService("com.sun.star.sheet.SheetCell")) then dateVal= currRange.string row= currRange.getCellAddress().Row
' result = TestDate(dateVal) If dateVal<>"" then If ValidateDate(dateVal) then If (startDate = "") OR ValidateDate(startDate)=False OR (endDate = "") OR ValidateDate(endDate)=False Then currRange.string = "" MsgBox "Please enter the dates in Return From and Return Perido To in Section A first." ThisComponent.CurrentController.setActiveSheet(ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("A_Basic_Info")) Else If checkFutureDate(dateVal) = False Then futureDtMsgStr = futureDtMsgStr & (row+1) MsgBox "Date of Deposit in Row " & futureDtMsgStr & " should be on or before current date." currRange.string="" End If End If Else msgStr = msgStr & (row+1) MsgBox "Please enter date value in dd/mm/yyyy format." currRange.string="" End If End If End If protectsheet("Q_IT_Payment_Credits") end If sheet.protect(Pwd)
'code
call addKRAListnersMultiCell("Q_IT_Payment_Credits","DtlIncomePaid.IncomePaidAdvanceListS","B","qDateOfDepositAdv_Listener_",qDateOfDepositAdv_Listener,qDateOfDepositAdv) thisComponent.CurrentController.Frame.ContainerWindow.Enable= True end sub
